document.full_text: the former n.f.l. players union asked a federal judge in minneapolis thursday to impose damages against the league for the way it negotiated to be paid in tv revenue during a lockout.
document.title: players ask judge to punish n.f.l. over tv deal
lines_and_colors: the former n.f.l. players union asked a federal judge in minneapolis thursday to impose damages against the league for the way it negotiated to be paid in tv revenue during a lockout.
